name: Super Tony Land
description:
Super Tony Land is the story of Tony, a plumber from Brooklyn doing his best to make a living in the Videogame Realm.

Build your own Levels and link them together to create Worlds, Characters, Stories and Challenges. Explore the Multiverse and find new adventures.

Use Tronics, a visual programing language, and physics to build almost anything you can dream up. From robots or rocketships, to dialog trees for telling complex stories.

  • Side Scrolling Platformer
  • Crazy Power Ups
  • Powerful Level Editor
  • Physics Based Construction
  • Dynamic Lighting on Sprites
  • Visual Programing Language
  • Character Creation
  • Link Levels to build whole Worlds!
  • Share Worlds over Steam Workshop
  • Find countless new adventures to play!
